subject: FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE
body:
FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE
NATIONAL HOUSE OF ASSEMBLY COMPLEX
SENATE HOUSE - UPPER CHAMBERS WUSE DISTRICT, COTONOU BENIN P.M.B. 0127,
AGBOKOU, COTONOU
Our Ref: FGN/SNT/STB
I want you to realize that my continuation of this email reminder is because I knew the value of this ATM Visa Card which you were about to receive and this fund will help you and your entire family.
We are not playing over this payment, i know my reason for the continuously sending of this notification to you, the fact is that you can't seem to trust any one again over this payment for what you have been in cantered in many months ago but i want you to trust me, 
i cannot scam you for $25 it's for bank processing of your ATM payment, this fee of $25 is clearly written to you before, i did not invent the bill to defraud you of $25 it is an official bank payment processing fee and the good part of this, is that you will never, ever be disturbed again over any kind of payment.
This is final and the forms from there become effective once we submit your payment application processing fee and pay the form fee of $25,i don't want you to lose this fund simply because of this bank processing fee.
The federal government is seen and very determined to pay your overdue debts, this is not a fluke, i would not want you to lose this fund out of ignorance,i will send you all the documents as soon as bank payment processing fee is paid, you have to trust me, you will get your fund, find a way to get this $25 you will not lose it, instead it will bring your financial breakthrough, Find the bank processing fee and send it to our bursary.
The reason why I am sending you this is because I want you to receive your $1.5M Usd immediately and the bank processing fee is paid.
You are Advice to send the fee by ($25 Amazon Card Or Google play Card Or iTunes Card to enable us get this completed without any more delay)
As soon as the payment is received today, you will receive your $1.5M the same today without any delay.
Best Regards
Mrs. Juliet Van

subject: Re: FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE
body:
Hello Mrs. Juliet Van,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite interesting to hear about this ATM Visa Card and the potential benefits it could bring to me and my family. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions, so I hope you don't mind if I ask a few questions.

Firstly, could you please explain more about what this ATM Visa Card is? How does it work exactly? And how did it come to be that I am the recipient of such a card?

Secondly, you mentioned a bank processing fee. Could you provide more details on what this fee covers? Is it a one-time payment or will there be additional fees in the future?

Lastly, you suggested sending the fee via azon Card Or Google play Card Or Card. Could you clarify what these are and how I would go about purchasing one?

I appreciate your patience in answering my questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some more details?

Best wishes,
Michael
